channel.title: TurtleScape Development
channel.description:
[center][b]~ Intro ~[/b] As some of you guys may know 1234ideclareathumbwar (me), I am forming a development team for another one of my servers.Not Carom, Not Dispatcher, Not shinscape but TurtleScape.Oh yes, may sound funny.But I call it Turtle Paradise, despite my new acc name :|
Yeah,This might be fun for one time, so please don't flame this topic.Here goes~[/center]
[center][size=15pt][b]TurtleScape[/b][/size][/center] [center]Name after name, Still can't choose, TurtleScape or Turtle Paradise? Who gives a shit, it's all about the coding now.Ah,nevermind, lets get started.[/center]
[center]Seriously, if you are going to read this only,GTFO because I really need help.[/center]
[center] - Safezone coders remaining quantity : 2 - Case coders remaining spaces : 3 - Skill coders remaining spaces : 5 - Item coders remaining spaces : 4 - Client coders remaining spaces : 2 - GFX (Banners etc.) remaining spaces : 3 - Starting position finder remaining spaces : 0 - Testers remaining spaces : Not open for testing yet[/center]
[center][b]For Safezone coders use this :[/b] [code] Preferred name : Why I want to code safezones : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center]
[center][b]For Case coders use this :[/b][/center] [center][code] Preferred name : Why I want to code Cases : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center]
[center][b]For skill coders use this : [/b] [code] Preferred name : Why I want to code Skills : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center]
[center][b]For Item coders use this : [/b] [code] Preferred name : Why I want to code Items : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center]
[center][b]For Client coders use this : [/b] [code] Preferred name : Why I want to code the client : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center]
[center][b]For GFX coders use this : [/b] [code] Preferred name : Why I want to code Graphics : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center]
[center][b]For Starting position finders use this : * First come first serve[/b] [code] Preferred name : Why I want to find good starting areas : Proof of experience : Give yourself a rating 1~10 : How long I have been in Mopar forums : [/code][/center] [center] [b]What I've done so far : [/b] - Added the 'Best welcome screen possible' - Added Sam Server's Pest control interface on top right screen - Hmm..Adding more soon[/center]
[center][b]Development team goals (Also my goals) : [/b] - Mining with handler - Smithing with handler - Woodcutting money - Runecrafting - Agility - Best PK Spot - Good economy - Skill capes - 100% cooking - Combat training, not those annoying objects that give out XP - Much more, I hope you guys will co-operate with me.[/center]
[center]The team consists of 3 membergroup types depending on their coding skills, those are : [/center] [center]Normal Coder Assigned to a yellow color name in the list of our dev team as a 'not that bad' coder.[/center]
[center]Good coder Assigned to an orange color name in the list of our dev team as a good coder.[/center]
[center]Legendary coder Assigned to a red color name in the list of our dev team as a very very good coder[/center]
[center][b]Our team so far : [/b]
[b]Safezones : [/b] - Turtle (me) - -
[b]Cases : [/b] - Jns - - -
[b]Skills : [/b] - - - - -
[b]Items : [/b] - Turtle - - -
[b]Client : [/b] - -
[b]GFX : [/b] - - -
[b]Start location finder : [/b] - Jns[/center]
[center][b]Waiting for approval/Declined list - - - - - - - - - - -[/b][/center]
[center][b]Accepted list : [/b] - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - [/center]
Sincerely, 1234ideclareathumbwar (Turtle)

item.title: TurtleScape Development
item.dc:creator: @Turtle_Paradise Turtle Paradise
item.description:
@Turtle_Paradise wrote:

My bad, i meant to say start loc and cases

please join these forums [url=http://dispatcher.smfforfree3.com]click here and stay active else you will be kicked out of the dev team

Read full topic

item.title: TurtleScape Development
item.dc:creator: @Jvscape_owner Jvscape owner
item.description:
@Jvscape_owner wrote:

mmk you said cases and items … not starting location…

Read full topic

item.title: TurtleScape Development
item.dc:creator: @Turtle_Paradise Turtle Paradise
item.description:
@Turtle_Paradise wrote:

[quote=“Jvscape owner, post:2, topic:132618”]Preferred name : Jns
Why I want to code Cases : They are real simple and i like to edit them
Proof of experience : V3xxscape
Give yourself a rating 1~10 : 7
How long I have been in Mopar forums : Since Like January maybe December

Preferred name : Jns
Why I want to code Items : Once again they are easy and simple to code
Proof of experience : V3xxscape or if(playerRights = 2) sendmessage(“this item will give players a phat … don’t missuse”);
This can be sent after they type a command for a christmas cracker or even for cases
Give yourself a rating 1~10 : 7 - 8
How long I have been in Mopar forums : Since Like January maybe December[/quote]

Two applications accepted

Read full topic

item.title: TurtleScape Development
item.dc:creator: @Jvscape_owner Jvscape owner
item.description:
@Jvscape_owner wrote:

Preferred name : Jns
Why I want to code Cases : They are real simple and i like to edit them
Proof of experience : V3xxscape
Give yourself a rating 1~10 : 7
How long I have been in Mopar forums : Since Like January maybe December

Preferred name : Jns
Why I want to find good starting areas : They are real fun to look around for and explore new cords
Proof of experience : V3xxscape
Give yourself a rating 1~10 : 9
How long I have been in Mopar forums : Since Like January maybe December

Preferred name : Jns
Why I want to code Items : Once again they are easy and simple to code
Proof of experience : V3xxscape or if(playerRights = 2) sendmessage(“this item will give players a phat … don’t missuse”);
This can be sent after they type a command for a christmas cracker or even for cases
Give yourself a rating 1~10 : 7 - 8
How long I have been in Mopar forums : Since Like January maybe December

Read full topic

As some of you guys may know 1234ideclareathumbwar (me), I am forming a development team for another one of my servers.Not Carom, Not Dispatcher, Not shinscape but TurtleScape.Oh yes, may sound funny.But I call it Turtle Paradise, despite my new acc name

Yeah,This might be fun for one time, so please don’t flame this topic.Here goes~[/center]
